scripts.build: yarn clean && ng build && cp README.md LICENSE dist/opal-frontend-common
scripts.pack:local: yarn exports:check && yarn build && yarn pack:check && find . -maxdepth 1 -type f \( -name 'hmcts-opal-frontend-common-*.tgz' -o -name 'hmcts-opal-frontend-common-ui-lib-*.tgz' \) -delete && npm_config_cache=${TMPDIR:-/tmp}/npm-cache-opal-common-ui npm pack ./dist/opal-frontend-common
scripts.audit:save: yarn npm audit --recursive --environment production --json > yarn-audit-known-issues || true
scripts.audit:check: yarn npm audit --recursive --environment production --json > yarn-audit-current || true && jq -s '[.[] | select(.type=="auditAdvisory") | .data.advisory.id] | sort' yarn-audit-current > current-ids.json && jq -s '[.[] | select(.type=="auditAdvisory") | .data.advisory.id] | sort' yarn-audit-known-issues > known-ids.json && diff -q known-ids.json current-ids.json || (echo '‚ùå New vulnerabilities detected. Please review.' && exit 1)
